thread.title: 'Blood Moon' seen as sign of end times by some Mormons
thread.title_full: 'Blood Moon' seen as sign of end times by some Mormons - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: 'Blood Moon' seen as sign of end times by some Mormons
text: A rare confluence of a lunar eclipse and a supermoon set to happen this weekend has prompted such widespread fear of an impending apocalypse that the Mormon Church was compelled to issue a statement cautioning the faithful to not get caught up in speculation about a major calamity. Â»
